author: VideoGameLord613
title: Nice mini lion
review: This, is, as all you know, a lion or dog. What I like about this set is that you can move the legs, so if you want to make stopmotions with it. They use only solid bricks, not transparent. A free animal, a good thing, 'cause it can scare minifigs if you want to make a stopmotion (hahahahahahahahaha).

author: legoguy2805
title: Animal Set
review:
I got this with the Daily Mirror. It comes in a plastic bag with fold-out instructions. It advertises Cool Convertibles and Fast Flyers on the back. 

Pros:
Moveable legs and feet
Stands up well
Good Colour Scheme

Cons:
None!

Overall, 5/5

author: legoguy_3000_
title: very good for a promo
review:
I got this free with the newspaper.

Pros:
stands up well
good colour scheme
good for a promo
easy to build

Cons:
no alternate models
small instructions,could get lost
front legs can't go high

very good for a promo 5/5

author: tkettle9719
title: How specific. An animal!
review:
This is one of the mini sets that is contained in the Mr. Magorium Creator set, and one I like a lot. Here's my review of the "Animal Set" or, as I call it, a dog.

Pros

  • -The dog looks mean, just like any other dog I've ever met in my life (they hate me.)
  • -The Brown and sand colors are a match made in heaven.
  • …

Cons

  • -The use of axles is nice, but it looks a bit strange.
  • -The tail had no thought process whatsoever.
  • …

This is a  very nicely made dog, which are easy to obtain and cheap to get. I would buy many for that special animal lover.
